description: The Ember Drake Hatchling is a young and fiery dragon, only recently hatched. Its scales glow with a soft, ember-like warmth, and its eyes burn with the curiosity of youth. Though small, it possesses the potential for immense power, making it a dangerous foe even at this early stage of life.

traits.name: Ember Breath
traits.description: The Ember Drake Hatchling can exhale a 15-foot cone of embers. Each creature in that area must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 2d6 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

traits.name: Fiery Scales
traits.description: Any creature that hits the Ember Drake Hatchling with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 1d4 fire damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6+2 piercing damage.
